allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-platform price comparison design document

- Support 12+ e-commerce platforms \(eBay, AliExpress, Taobao, etc.\)
- AI-based keyword extraction and product matching
- Configurable cost calculation parameters
- Comparison table UI for profit analysis
- Incremental extension architecture \(Plan A\)
EOF
\)")
Bash(git commit -m "Add .worktrees/ to .gitignore for isolated development")
Bash(git commit -m "docs: add comprehensive implementation plan for multi-platform comparison")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add AI keyword extraction for cross-platform search")
Bash(git commit -m "fix: improve error handling and fallback in keyword extractor")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add search result scrapers for eBay, AliExpress, Taobao")
Bash(git commit -m "refactor: extract shared helpers and improve code quality in searchScrapers")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add tab manager for parallel platform searches")
Bash(git commit -m "fix: prevent resource leaks and improve error handling in tabManager")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add profit calculator for multi-platform analysis")
Bash(git commit -m "fix: add input validation and div-by-zero guards in profitCalculator")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add comparison table components for multi-platform display")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: integrate multi-platform analysis into main app flow")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add Walmart, JD, Pinduoduo scrapers and enable platforms")
Bash(git commit -m "feat: add retry logic and improved error handling to tab manager")
Bash(git commit -m "docs: update README and CLAUDE.md for multi-platform comparison feature")
